com.biorecorder.edflib.filters

Class DataRecordsJoiner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biorecorder.edflib.DataRecordsWriter
      • com.biorecorder.edflib.filters.DataRecordsFilter
        • com.biorecorder.edflib.filters.DataRecordsJoiner

  • public class DataRecordsJoiner
extends DataRecordsFilter
    Permits to join (piece together) given number of incoming DataRecords. Resultant output DataRecords (that will be written to underlying DataRecordsWriter) have the following structure:

    [ resultant number of samples from channel_1 ,
    resultant number of samples from channel_2,
    ...
    resultant number of samples from channel_i ]

    Where:
    resultant number of samples from channel_i = number of samples from channel_i in original DataRecord * numberOfRecordsToJoin
    duration of resulting DataRecord = duration of original DataRecord * numberOfRecordsToJoin

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataRecordsJoiner(int numberOfRecordsToJoin, DataRecordsWriter out)
      Creates a new DataRecordsJoiner to join given numbers of incoming DataRecords and write the resultant DataRecords to the specified underlying DataRecordsWriter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void writeDigitalDataRecord(int[] digitalData, int offset)
      Accumulate and join the specified number of incoming DataRecords into one resultant DataRecord and when it is ready write it to the underlying DataRecordsWriter
